page.title: 13MY HOME AND GARDEN
page.content: I live in a house on Tavern Close, Beetley.It is a new housing estate.We moved into our house in 1980 and while we have been living there we have had two extensions built.One was a kitchen because our old kitchen was too small, so we changed it into a dining room. The other extension was a porch over our front door. Our house has 4 bedrooms,lounge,dining room,kitchen,bathroom,2 toilets ,hall and a porch. We have a 1 acre garden with a big pond at the bottom. My father runs a chain of 4 local shops and commutes regularly to London for purchasing.My mother runs a beauty parlour on the first floor of the Dereham shop. I have one younger sister who is at school with me.
